japanese:
お、いたいた。
ちょっといいか、お前ら。
translation:
Oh, there you are.
Can I talk to you guys for a sec?

japanese: あれ、どうしたの？
translation: Hey, what's up?

japanese: 聞きたいことがあるんだ。
translation: I wanted to ask you something.

japanese: なによ、改まって。
translation: What's up?

japanese:
気になってたんだが、
お前ら、昨日はどこに行ってたんだ？
translation:
I'm kinda curious,
but where did you guys end up yesterday?

japanese: え？　どうしてそんなこと聞くの？
translation: Hm? Why do you ask?

japanese:
いや、俺と五月のための自由行動だったんだろ？
ありがたかったんだが、
お前らはちゃんと楽しめてたのか？
translation:
Well, you all gave Itsuki and I free time together, right?
I appreciated it, but did you guys have any fun?

japanese:
その、俺と五月に
付き合わせたみたいになっちまったわけだし。
translation: Cause it ended up being like we were left on a date.

japanese: ああ、そういうこと。
translation: Yeah, that's right.

japanese: 気づいてたわけじゃないんだ。
translation: So, he didn't notice after all, huh.

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
なんでもないわ。
私たちは適当にブラブラしてたのよ。
アメリカンビレッジとか。
translation:
It's nothing.
We just wandered around.
Like at the American Village and so on.

japanese:
アメリカンビレッジ？
俺と五月も行ったな。
translation:
American Village?
We went there too.

japanese:
そうなんだ？
鉢合わせしなくて良かったー。
邪魔になっちゃうもん。
translation:
Really?
Good thing we didn't bump into each other.
It would've been awkward.

japanese:
ま、変な気遣いは無用よ。
私たちもらいはちゃんも楽しく過ごしてたわ。
translation:
Well, don't worry about it.
We all had a good time, Raiha-chan too.

japanese: なんだ、らいはも一緒だったのか。
translation: Oh, Raiha was with you guys too?

japanese:
あー、うん、結局５人一緒にいたんだ。
なんとなくそうなっちゃって。
translation:
Ah, yeah, we ended up being a group of five.
It just kinda happened.

japanese:
そうか。
まあ、ならよかった。
translation:
I see.
Well, that's good then.

japanese:
お前らが時間を作ってくれたから、
五月ともちゃんと話せた。
translation:
Thanks for making time for us.
I was able to talk to Itsuki properly because of that.

japanese:
あの時間がなかったらきっと、
お互いモヤモヤしっぱなしだったと思う。
本当に助かった。
translation:
If we hadn't had that time,
I think we would've been frustrated with each other.
It really helped us out.

japanese:
どういたしまして。
でも、やけに素直ね。
translation:
You're welcome.
But you're surprisingly honest.

japanese: それだけ五月ちゃんが大事ってことなんじゃない？
translation:
That's because Itsuki-chan
is that important to you, right, Futaro-kun?

japanese: ま、まあ、その……。
translation: W-well, that's...

japanese: 照れ隠しでも否定しないあたり、フー君も相当ねぇ。
translation:
Fu-kun, you always get so embaressed when trying
to deny something.

japanese: けど、五月を泣かせた件は忘れてないから。
translation: But, don't forget that you made Itsuki cry.

japanese:
……は？　泣かせた？
ちょ、ど、どど、どういうことだ？
translation:
...What? I made her cry?
W-wait, wh-wh-what do you mean?

japanese: あれ、君は気付いてなかったんだ。
translation: Ah, you didn't realize?

japanese:
一昨日、夜の散歩に行ってたんでしょ？
で、部屋に帰ってきた五月ちゃんが、ちょっとね。
translation:
The night before yesterday,
when you went for a walk at night,
Itsuki-chan came back to the room, well, a little upset.

japanese:
（一昨日の夜って、ウミカジテラスに行った時……
　走って行っちまったが、あれ、泣いてたのか！？）
translation:
(Two nights ago?
 That was when we went to Umikaji Terrace...
 and she ran off. Wait, she was crying?!)

japanese:
（怒ってるだろうとか嫌われてるだろうとか
　考えてはいたが……そこまでだったとは……）
translation:
(I was worried that she was angry
 or hated me or something,
 but...I didn't think it was that bad...)

japanese:
一体、五月になにをしたのかしら？
返答によっては……覚悟なさい。
translation:
What exactly did you do to Itsuki?
Depending on your answer... 
you better prepare yourself.

japanese: そ、それは……。
translation: W-well...

japanese: い、言う必要ないし！
translation: I-I don't have to say anything!

japanese:
ふうん？
それってつまり、言えないようなことをしたのね？
translation:
Hmm?
So that means you did something
you can't talk about?

japanese: そ……そういうわけじゃ……。
translation: Th-that's not it...

japanese: だったら白状しなさい。
translation: Then, confess.

japanese:
いや、五月にも関わることだし
俺の一存では話せないっつーかな！？
translation:
Well, it's related to Itsuki,
so I can't speak on her behalf!

japanese:
……ふふっ！
そんなテンパらなくてもいいわよ、
ちょっとした冗談だから。
translation:
...Heheh!
You don't have to be so flustered,
it's just a little joke.

japanese: そうそう、二乃も怒ってるわけじゃないよ。
translation: Yeah, Nino isn't really angry either.

japanese:
な、なあ！
五月、本当に泣いてたのか？
どんな様子だったんだ？
translation:
H-hey!
Did Itsuki really cry?
What was her expression like?

japanese:
別に大泣きしてたわけじゃないよ。
ちょっと涙目になってたくらい。
translation:
She wasn't really bawling or anything.
Just teary-eyed.

japanese: ……だが、泣いてはいたんだよな？
translation: ...But she was crying, right?

japanese: その点は否定できないわ。
translation: Can't deny that point.

japanese: まだなにもしてないと言うか……。
translation: I hadn't even done anything yet...

japanese: まだ？
translation: Yet?

japanese:
い、いや！
その……こ、恋人なわけだし、いずれはな！？
translation:
N-no!
I mean...we're in a relationship,
so eventually, right?!

japanese:
あはは！
フータロー君テンパりすぎ！
別に、二乃も怒ってるわけじゃないから。
translation:
Ahaha!
Futaro-kun, you're getting too flustered!
It's not like Nino's really angry about it.

japanese: ……そうなのか？
translation: ...Is that so?

japanese:
ええ、ちょっと茶化しただけ。
フー君、いい反応するんだもの。
translation:
Yes, I was making fun of you a little.
You just react so well.

japanese:
な、なあ！
五月、本当に泣いてたのか？
どんな様子だったんだ？
translation:
H-hey!
Did Itsuki really cry?
What was her expression like?

japanese:
別に大泣きしてたわけじゃないよ。
ちょっと涙目になってたくらい。
translation:
She wasn't really bawling or anything.
Just teary-eyed.

japanese: ……だが、泣いてはいたんだよな？
translation: ...But she was crying, right?

japanese: その点は否定できないわ。
translation: Can't deny that point.

japanese: 黙秘させてくれ。
translation: I'll take an oath of silence.

japanese: あら、いやに強気ね。
translation: Oh, how confident you are.

japanese:
俺だけの話じゃないしな。
五月の名誉にも関わることだし。
translation:
It's not just my secret.
It's related to Itsuki's honor too.

japanese:
そう、それならいいわ。
別に言わなくたって。
translation:
Well, that's fine then.
You don't have to say anything.

japanese:
フータロー君、
五月ちゃんのことが本当に大切なんだね。
translation:
Futaro-kun,
Itsuki-chan really means a lot to you,
doesn't she.

japanese:
な、なあ！
五月、本当に泣いてたのか？
どんな様子だったんだ？
translation:
H-hey!
Did Itsuki really cry?
What was her expression like?

japanese:
別に大泣きしてたわけじゃないよ。
ちょっと涙目になってたくらい。
translation:
She wasn't really bawling or anything.
Just teary-eyed.

japanese: ……だが、泣いてはいたんだよな？
translation: ...But she was crying, right?

japanese: その点は否定できないわ。
translation: Can't deny that point.

japanese: （そこまでやらかしてたか、俺……）
translation: (I messed up that much, huh...)

japanese: わかりやすく落ち込んでるわね。
translation: It's understandable that you're feeling down.

japanese: 落ち込みもする……。
translation: I do feel down...

japanese:
でも、そのことについては
ちゃんと五月ちゃんとも話したんでしょ？
translation:
But, you talked about it
with Itsuki-chan properly, right?

japanese:
ああ。
お互い思ってたことはちゃんと言った。
translation:
Yeah.
We both said what was on our minds.

japanese:
なら、それで解決でいいんじゃないかなって、
お姉さんは思うけどな。
translation:
Then, maybe it's okay to consider it resolved,
is what I think.

japanese:
それでも泣かせたのは事実だ。
どうしたって消せるものじゃない。
translation:
The fact remains that I made her cry.
No matter how you look at it, it can't be erased.

japanese:
一花、二乃。
俺はもう二度と五月を泣かせたりしない。
お前らに誓う。
translation:
Ichika, Nino.
I swear to you that I will never make Itsuki cry again.
Please trust me.
Huh...

japanese:
だから安心してくれ……ってのも変だが、
ともかく、お前らの大事な家族を
悲しませたりしないよう、最大の努力をする。
translation:
I mean, I know it's strange to promise such a thing...
but anyway, I'll do my absolute best
to not make your precious little sister sad.

japanese:
フー君って卑怯よ。
こういう時はちゃんと決めるんだから。
translation:
Fu-kun, you're such a wimp.
You should make a proper decision at times like this.

japanese: 二乃？
translation: Nino?

japanese:
はいはい、わかったわ。
頼んだわよ。
translation:
Yeah, yeah, I got it.
It's in your hands.

japanese: 五月ちゃんをよろしくね、フータロー君。
translation:
We're counting on you to take good care of Itsuki-chan,
Futaro-kun.
